ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Performs sparse linear discriminant analysis for Gaussians and mixture of Gaussian models.
Performs sparse linear discriminant analysis for Gaussians and mixture of Gaussian models.

name: r-sparselda
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1-9' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-sparselda
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/sparseLDA_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/sparseLDA/sparseLDA_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0b32be205dbbd1963b946e41df9ad668d78ec9e83a6fa2b5b3dd03c266e27acc

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1006
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-elasticnet
    - r-mda
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-elasticnet
    - r-mda

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('sparseLDA')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('sparseLDA')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.imm.dtu.dk/~lhc, https://github.com/topepo/sparselda
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: Performs sparse linear discriminant analysis for Gaussians and mixture of Gaussian
    models.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: sparseLDA
# Version: 0.1-9
# Date: 2016-09-22
# Title: Sparse Discriminant Analysis
# Author: Line Clemmensen <lhc@imm.dtu.dk>, contributions by Max Kuhn
# Maintainer: Max Kuhn <mxkuhn@gmail.com>
# Imports: elasticnet, MASS, mda
# Depends: R (>= 2.10)
# Description: Performs sparse linear discriminant analysis for Gaussians and mixture of Gaussian models.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# URL: http://www.imm.dtu.dk/~lhc, https://github.com/topepo/sparselda
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2016-09-22 14:49:09 UTC; kuhna03
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2016-09-22 17:10:01
